in palamuwanna nam awurudu 9kma balaye siti, athishayinma mardanakari, adhikariwadi saha dushitha palakayaku, aluthen, dushkaratha mada pihituwa gath, jayaganimata eetharam idakada nothibu aluth wipaksha sandhanayak wisin prajathanthrawadi margayen balayen nerapa damimayi. 2009 sita 2018 dakwa balaye siti malesiyanu agamathi najib rasak saha ohuge palanathanthraya, adhikarawadaya, balaya ayuthu lesa bhawitha kirima, dushanaya saha uddhachchabhawaya athin samana wanne lankawe mahinda rajapaksha mahathata saha ohuge palanathanthrayatayi.

pawidi nama :- amarapura nikaye iddamalgoda wihara parshwaye mahopadhyaya siri wisuddharamadhipathi janadhipathi sammanalabhi delwala maha widyalaye hitapu niyojya widuhalpathi kawya wisharada kawya shiromani shasthrawedi panditha pabotuwe pemananda na himi.wada wasana pansala :- pabotuwa siri wisuddharama wiharayaupan dinaya :- 1938 juli masa 31 dinapiya :- pi.ji. hurathalhami mahathamawa :– aar.ee. yasohami mathawasahodara sahodariyan :- sahodarayek saha sahodariyan hathara denek pamanigihi nama :- pi.ji. podi appuhamimulika adhyapanaya :- delwala maha widyalayausas adhyapanaya :- rathnapura muwagama siri wisuddharama piriwena :- 1953 minuwangoda yagodamulla wijayaraja piriwena 1954 –1956 kolambaa maligakanda widyodaya maha piriwena 1956 –1957 dakwa 1960 di widyodaya wishwa widyalayen shasthrawedi upadhiya labaganimapawidi wima :– 1953 mayi masa 29 dinaupadhyayan wahanse :- alwaththe rathanajothi na himiaacharyayan wahanse :- pabotuwe shri wisuddharamadhipathiwa wada wisu kodagoda medhananda nahimi.upasampada dinaya :– 1959 juli masa 15 wana dina rathnapura angammana purana wiharastha udakukkhepa simamalakayedipawidi diwiye wadagath siduwim :– pabotuwa siri wisuddharama wiharadhipathi dhuraya labimabhashanthara danuma :- sinhala bhashawata amatharawa pali, sanskrutha, ingi්rasi, demala yana bhashawange hasala danumak thibima .palakala kruthi :- “lama pelata budu siritha kawiyen” kawya kruthiyasammana upadhi aadiya :- amarapura siri saddhamma yukthika maha nikaye iddamalgoda wihara parshwayeth mahopadhyaya yana gaurawa namaya pirinamima.

bhauthika jiwithayata mulin piwisimata manasa bhawitha karana husma ganime swarupa atha; jiwa swarupayan, prakashitha lokayan haraha thama balaya maru kirimata jiwaye maha sagaraya bhawitha karayi; kumbaalkaruge rodaya men manasa kriya karana siyalu balawega ha aakruthi sandaha kendriya ho raswim bhumiyak lesa bhawitha karana tharaka aakruthi; sharirika lingika swarupayan, samathulithathawaya ho samabara rodaya lesa bhawitha karana athara emangin manasa samabarathawaya, pararthakamithwaya ha ekamuthukama pilibanda abhirahasa igena gani; sathwa lokaye swabhawika sanwardhanayata anuwa aashawan dala satahan kirimata, drushya kirimata saha wargikaranaya kirimata sewaya karana aashawan-aakruthi; manasehi swabhawaya nirupanaya karana, manushyathwaye paramadarshayan penwana, saha nawa paurushaye swarupaya godananga athi apadrawya ho bija lesa sewaya karana murthi shilpin, chithra shilpin saha wenath kalakaruwan wisin nirmanaya karana lada sithuwili aakruthi; pudgala-swarupaya, eya jiwithayen jiwithayata nonasi pawathna charithaye ho eegowaki.

wisheshayen mewan awasthawaka apa wani ratak enam nirantharayen “mathata thitha” thabimata katha karana, dainikawa “mathin walakennata” porondu dena ratak lesa lokaya hamuwe aadarshamath wanawa wenuwata me mathin langakaragath arajikathwaya katha kirimata mita wada sudusu kalayak thawath nathi tharam ya.
